titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3935) to amend title 49, United States Code, to reauthorize and improve the Federal Aviation Administration and other civil aviation programs, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3941) to prohibit the use of the facilities of a public elementary school, a public secondary school, or an institution of higher education to provide shelter for aliens who have not been admitted into the United States, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3935) to amend title 49, United States Code, to reauthorize and improve the Federal Aviation Administration and other civil aviation programs, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3941) to prohibit the use of the facilities of a public elementary school, a public secondary school, or an institution of higher education to provide shelter for aliens who have not been admitted into the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 118-147, by Mrs. Houchin.
The resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 3935 and H.R. 3941 both under a structured rule with one hour of general debate. The resolution provides for a motion to recommit on each measure.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 30.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 597.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 213 - 207 (Roll no. 331).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 206 (Roll no. 332).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3935) to amend title 49, United States Code, to reauthorize and improve the Federal Aviation Administration and other civil aviation programs, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3941) to prohibit the use of the facilities of a public elementary school, a public secondary school, or an institution of higher education to provide shelter for aliens who have not been admitted into the United States.
